meanings.definition: Tendons or connective tissues that attach muscles to bones.
meanings.sent1: The sinews in his leg helped him jump high.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained how important sinews are for movement.
meanings.sent3: The sinews in the rubber band were stretched to their limit.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the sinews that held her together during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The sinews of the ship's rigging creaked in the wind.

meanings.sent1: The sinews of the team were their unity and determination.
meanings.sent2: The sinews of the economy are small businesses.
meanings.sent3: His sinews of persuasion convinced everyone to join the party.
meanings.sent4: Love was the sinews that bound them together.
meanings.sent5: The sinews of nature are the elements that sustain life.
